address: Xã Trung Sơn, Huyện Quan Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Trung Sơn, Huyện Quan Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa"**

Okay, so the user is asking about the new administrative setup for "Xã Trung Sơn" in Quan Hóa district, Thanh Hóa province. My process is to systematically check the relevant resolutions and lists.

First, I confirmed that Thanh Hóa province didn't undergo any changes at the provincial level, based on Resolution 60-NQ/TW. This wasn't a concern, but it's always good to verify.

Then, I dove into the specific commune-level changes, specifically focusing on Resolution 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15, the key resolution for Thanh Hóa's administrative rearrangements. I carefully examined each line, looking for any mention of "Trung Sơn" from Quan Hóa.

I initially ruled out several lines because they didn't involve "Trung Sơn." Then, I hit the jackpot with line 146. It explicitly stated that "Trung Sơn" was one of the 21 communes that "không thực hiện sắp xếp" – meaning they *weren't* rearranged.  This implies the administrative unit would remain the same.  Crucially, it implied that "Trung Sơn" referred to the "Trung Sơn" in Quan Hóa, based on the context of the other listed Quan Hóa communes.

To confirm this, I cross-referenced this finding with the "New wards" list.  I was looking for "Xã Trung Sơn" in "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa."  The presence of the entry {"ward_code":"14875","ward_name":"Xã Trung Sơn","province_name":"Tỉnh Thanh Hóa"} confirmed my conclusion.

Therefore, my expert analysis concludes that "Xã Trung Sơn, Huyện Quan Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" remains unchanged as a result of the rearrangement efforts. The name and (likely) the code remain the same. The resolution and the "New wards" list corroborate this.

citation.header: 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Thanh Hóa
citation.line: 146. Sau khi sắp xếp, tỉnh Thanh Hóa có 166 đơn vị hành chính cấp xã, gồm 147 xã và 19 phường; trong đó có 126 xã, 19 phường hình thành sau sắp xếp quy định tại Điều này và 21 xã không thực hiện sắp xếp là các xã Phú Xuân (huyện Quan Hóa), Mường Chanh, Quang Chiểu, Tam Chung, Pù Nhi, Nhi Sơn, Mường Lý, Trung Lý, Trung Sơn, Na Mèo, Sơn Thủy, Sơn Điện, Mường Mìn, Tam Thanh, Yên Khương, Yên Thắng, Xuân Thái, Bát Mọt, Yên Nhân, Lương Sơn, Vạn Xuân.
